page.title: 12Other Industry in Bardon
page.content: We visited two{industries}down Grange Road,off the A50{.Redland Prismo}is a {bitumen-handling}plant which brings bitumen by rail in vacuum waggons from the Shell Refinery at Ellesmere Port. The bitumen is heated,then transferred into special lorries for delivery all over the country.Some of it goes to the tar plant at Bardon Quarry.{Quarry {Manufacturing and Supplies}is a small company which repairs and maintains crushing equipment for quarries. We also visited the{British Rail {Signal Box}which controls the level crossing on Grange Road and the sidings.48 goods trains go through in 24 hours. On the Quarry site are two smaller companies.{Steer Hire}Plant is owned by the Quarry and{Charcon}belongs to the English China Clay Company and uses Quarry products.
